main event: A civilian reported seeing four bright objects in the sky near Houma, Louisiana, on February 26, 1965.
interesting points: The observation lasted for about 15 minutes,The objects changed colors from red to green several times,The estimated speed of the objects was 300-1500 mph,The witness described the objects as being the size of a basketball and giving off a luminous glow,The sighting was reported to military authorities as an unidentified flying object.
witness description: A 32-year-old male civilian with a military background.
